attributes.action: Carry out a reform of the HFEA to make it accountable for its actions to both parliament and the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Carry out a reform of the HFEA to make it accountable for its actions to both parliament and the public.  To ensure that the bureaucracy does not stiffle medical advancement,  empowering competant fertiltiy doctors to make the right decisions for their patients. To ensure that the Patient representatives are elected by the people that they represent - patients and not recruited by the board of the HFEA.

To carry out a full investigation of those clinics which currently fall below the national and regional average success rates to ensure that patients are being given best advice and the best chance of success.
